ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras: 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 70 ft IR Distance. Low Illumination Color: 0.3Lux, B&W;: 0Lux. Vandal resistant & water proof.
8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2TB HDD, 960H/FD1 video input, 8 full channel realtime playback, Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop Simultaneous Output, Support AVI Backup,Snapshot,Record Lock,Record Cutting, Support up to 8 Hard Drives.
iPhone/Android Viewable, PTZ Control.
FREE 1 Year Warranty and FREE Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprise CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H/FD1 Realtime Playback, 6 Sony CCD Cameras 700 TVL VariFocal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
